articles.author: Peter Hannam
articles.title: South32 offers more than $100m to counter water losses from its mine - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: South32, the miner behind a plan to expand coal extraction under Sydney's catchment, says it has offered more than $100 million over the life of the project to compensate for water losses.
